data.title: Anatole France Book List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Anatole France's books in order (54 books). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.

The son of a bookseller, Jacques Anatole François Thibault (1844-1924) spent most of his life around books. His father's bookstore was called the Librairie de France, and from this name he took his nom-de plume, Anatole France....
